title: The 151 Swizzle Recipe
full_text:
The 151 Swizzle Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
151-proof Demerara rum
(Lemon Hart and El Dorado are the standard brands)
1/2
ounce
fresh
lime juice
1/2
ounce
simple syrup
(equal parts sugar and water, mixed until dissolved)
6
drops
Pernod
(may substitute Ricard or another pastis, or Herbsaint)
1
dash
Angostura bitters
1
cup
crushed
ice
Nutmeg
and
cinnamon stick
, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients (except nutmeg) in a blender, and blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds. Pour into a pilsner glass (or other tall glass) and add crushed ice to fill. Dust with nutmeg; garnish with a cinnamon stick.
Rum
